faqs.question: Kan utlänningar köpa fastighet i Spanien?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners have identical property ownership rights as Spanish citizens. The process is straightforward with transparent legal frameworks protecting all purchasers. faqs.question: Vilka är kostnaderna för att köpa fastighet i Spanien?
faqs.answer: Acquisition costs total approximately 6-10% of purchase price, including transfer tax (6-8%), notary fees (0.5-1%), and legal services (1-2%). First-time buyers receive reduced transfer tax rates. Detailed cost breakdowns are provided upfront, with no hidden expenses. Professional advisors guide purchasers through all requirements ensuring transparent, straightforward transactions.

faqs.question: Kan jag få ett bolån i Spanien som utlänning?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreign purchasers access mortgages through Spanish banks covering 60-80% of property value. Competitive interest rates match or exceed UK rates, with terms extending 25-30 years. Income verification and credit assessment are standard requirements. Spanish financial advisors connect purchasers with optimal mortgage products, simplifying the application process significantly.

faqs.question: Behöver jag visum för att köpa fastighet i Spanien?
faqs.answer: No visa is required for property acquisition. Non-residents can purchase property without residency status. However, property ownership enables Non-Lucrative Visa eligibility, permitting long-term Spain residence with passive income requirements. Annual property visits maintain ownership status, and residency permits provide additional benefits including healthcare access.
